channel.title: > Nolife is kind of life <
channel.description: Recent content on > Nolife is kind of life <

item.title: Octopus Film Festival 2020
item.description: Again Octopus Film Festival took place Gdańsk❗️ That was third edition. First two editions take five days and has one “hidden show”. This time there was little different (it’s ofc caused by COVID-19). There wasn’t hidden show, max number of people on each movie was reduced - that’s why I missed some projections 😭 But there was good news too!!! Organizers prepare to us something new - Audience Award for the best move in category “Genre Cinema” (idk how to translate it properly).

item.title: Pol'and'Rock Festival 2020
item.description: 2020 is really weird. SARS-CoV-2 🦠 caused, we had to sitting at our homes, with only virtual entertainment. After few months, goverments allows for some events, but with strictly rules 😷. Thats why, Woodstock festival in Poland (nowadays known as Pol’and’Rock) took place in internet this year. Only small group of lucky guys, won a tickets (Woodstock was never ticketed), rest of us, had to watch festival in the Internet. For these three days my home turns into “festival stage”.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi! I’m Marcin. Hmmm… 🤔 What could I say about myself? Maybe I’ll list everything 😄 Games ❤ Board Games 🎲 Card Games 🃏 Video Games 🕹 I have less time than few years ago, but IMO 🎮🎮 are not only for kids 😉 This point could look complicated, so I’ll divide it for two points: Short version: Movies 🎬 Longer version: Old📼/new, razzies/{B,C,D,…,Z}-Class/(just great and funny in all their weakness) movies 🎥 (ofc.

item.title: Why I made this blog?
item.description: In the chilhood, I had blog only once and never thought, I’ll create any blog again. 😊 About week ago at work, I had to find solution for problem with angular, which I solved half year ago. Digging these same pages led me to fix it. After that, I wrote message to my friend TehGM about it to let my flustration out. He sugested me to create blog and document how I solve problems.
